summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5806 for the improvement of East 82nd Street, (North Side), from 35th Avenue Northeast to the east line of Wedgwood Addition No. 2; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76564, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
